business.headline: What after Armani: The way ahead for iconic Italian fashion empireGiorgio Armani, who died at 91 leaving no children, built one of the world's most iconic fashion brands and ensured its future independence through a foundation.

US scraps Biden-era plan mandating airlines to pay for flight disruptionsIn December, the US Department of Transportation under then-President Joe Biden sought public comment on the rulemaking process about whether airlines should be required to pay $200 to $300 for domestic delays of at least three hours and up to $775 for longer delays.

GST reforms: Will consumption and investment get a real boost? Experts debateA major overhaul of the Goods and Services Tax, termed GST 2.0, has been initiated, which the government is calling a significant 'Diwali bonus' for consumers and the economy.

GST 2.0 is game-changing and transformational reform: Piyush GoyalIn an exclusive interview with India Today TV's Managing Editor Marya Shakil, Union Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal called GST 2.0 the most game-changing and transformational reform the country has seen in several decades.

GST 2.0 a game-changing reform for citizens and businesses: Piyush GoyalUnion Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal has described the new GST 2.0 reforms as a "game-changing" move that will simplify taxes, reduce prices on daily essentials, and give a major boost to India's economy.

Zara, Lacoste, and other global brands face higher GST: ReportInternational names such as Zara, H&M, Levi's, Lacoste, Nike and Uniqlo could be directly impacted. These brands rely heavily on India's growing middle-class youth, who see branded apparel as a lifestyle upgrade but remain highly price-sensitive.

GST reforms commendable, will have far-reaching benefits: Anand SharmaIn an exclusive interview with India Today TV, former Commerce Minister Anand Sharma provides his assessment of the next-generation GST reforms.

Sensex, Nifty end higher: Is GST 2.0 next big trigger for the economy?Speaking on the possible impact on the market closing show on BT TV, Vinit Bolinjkar, Head of Research at Ventura Securities, said the domestic economy is set for a strong rebound.

What are 'sin' goods? All you need to know about special 40% GST slabFrom September 22, 2025, India will have a simpler GST system with just two main rates and a special 40% slab. This top rate applies only to a few products, popularly known as 'sin goods'. Let's break it down.

Sensex, Nifty end higher as profit booking caps GST 2.0 rallyAnalysts said the day began on a strong note, with sweeping GST rate cuts fuelling broad-based buying in auto, FMCG, and consumer durable stocks. However, sustained selling pressure in the second half of trade eroded much of the early momentum.

GST 2.0 guide: What gets cheaper, costlier, and everything in betweenJust as the festival season approaches, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman has delivered a comprehensive GST overhaul that will put more money back into the pockets of Indians.

Ghee-ST reforms big on celebrations, big on India's dairy battleIn a big boost to Indian households, the government is bringing down the rates of common goods by reducing the Goods and Services Tax (GST). The Modi government publicised it as a 'Historic Diwali Gift for the Nation'. Ghee, milk and other dairy products are synonymous with Indian festivals, and the relief comes amid India digging its heels on the dairy and farm sector in trade talks with the US.

entertainment.headline: STR 49: Silambarasan steps into Vetri Maaran's Vada Chennai universeThe official glimpse of Vetri Maaran's 'STR 49', starring Silambarasan TR, has been unveiled, promising a gripping new chapter in the 'Vada Chennai' universe.

Baaghi 4 certified A after CBFC cuts violence and adult scenesTiger Shroff's Baaghi 4 receives an A certificate after multiple CBFC cuts for violence and adult content. The film's runtime was shortened voluntarily, highlighting increasing censorship challenges in Bollywood.

Dulquer Salmaan crowns Naslen 'superstar', fans say the prophecy has begunDulquer Salmaan's "superstar" comment about Naslen shows his quick rise in Malayalam cinema. His recent film 'Lokah: Chapter 1' is currently ruling theatres.

Top films and series releasing on Prime Video this weekendRajkummar Rao's 'Maalik' and Vishnu Manchu's 'Kannappa' start streaming on the OTT platform this weekend. Tilly Ramsay's cooking show 'Dish It Out' comes out, and so does K Drama 'Confidence Queen'. Have is a look at the complete list of the latest Prime Video releases.

Singer Karan Aujla confirms performance on The Tonight Show with Jimmy FallonSinger Karan Aujla will perform on 'The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon' this Tuesday. Aujla will be the second Paunjabi singer to appear on the show after Diljit Dosanjh.

Archana Puran Singh's son Aaryamann and Yogita Bihani move in togetherAaryamann Sethi and his fiancee Yogita Bihani have moved in together to a house gifted by Archana Puran Singh and her husband Parmeet Sethi. The couple documented the process of moving in a vlog shared on Aaryamann's YouTube channel.

Majnu Bhai supremacy: Vijay Varma brings home Anil Kapoor's iconic Welcome paintingVijay Varma thrilled Bollywood fans by posing with the iconic Majnu Bhai painting from 'Welcome', reviving a beloved slice of cinematic humour that still brings joy years after its debut.

Punjab floods: Bollywood and Punjabi stars unite for relief effortsBollywood and Punjabi celebrities have stepped up to support flood-affected Punjab with monetary aid and relief efforts. Sonu Sood, Randeep Hooda, and Kapil Sharma extended their help.

Actor Sivakarthikeyan on Madharaasi: It's a Murugadoss film and I am in itAfter the blockbuster success of 'Amaran', Sivakarthikeyan has taken on a new challenge with 'Madharaasi', an action thriller directed by AR Murugadoss. In an interview with India Today, he discussed 'Madharaasi', doing action films, Tamil cinema's quest for a Rs 1000 crore-film and the satisfaction he receives as a producer.

You actor Penn Badgley welcomes identical twin boys with wife Domino KirkeAmerican actor Penn Badgley and wife Domino Kirke have welcomed identical twin sons. The couple shares emotional moments from the pregnancy and reflects on raising twins in today's world.

The Return of Sonu Nigam and the voice Bollywood forgotSonu Nigam makes a powerful return to Bollywood, reviving the magic of melody that the industry has been missing for years. With 'Bijuria' and 'Pardesiya' striking gold, one thing is clear: Nigam is and will always be irreplaceable.

Coolie on OTT: When and where to watch Rajinikanth-Lokesh Kanagaraj's Tamil actionerAfter a spectacular theatrical run, Rajinikanth and Lokesh Kanagaraj's 'Coolie' is set for its OTT streaming. The Tamil film, also starring Nagarjuna, Shruti Haasan, and others, will release on Prime Video.

Will Taylor Swift perform at Super Bowl halftime? NFL commissioner respondsNFL commissioner Roger Goodell suggested Taylor Swift's Super Bowl halftime show appearance was "a maybe", heightening anticipation as fans await word from Roc Nation.

Travis Kelce on introducing Taylor Swift as fiancee to colleagues: Pretty coolTravis Kelce recently introduced Taylor Swift as his fiancee to his colleagues. He shared the moment on the 'New Heights' podcast. The player also expressed gratitude for the overwhelming love from fans.

The Paper, The Office spin-off, renewed for Season 2 ahead of September 5 premierePeacock's new sitcom 'The Paper' has been renewed for a second season even before its first episode airs. Featuring a talented cast and veteran creators, the series will begin to stream from September 5.

No objectionable content: Court rejects plea against Akshay Kumar's Jolly LLB 3The Allahabad High Court recently dismissed the plea against Akshay Kumar's 'Jolly LLB 3'. The film is slated to hit the big screens on September 19.

Bigg Boss 19 episode 10: Pranit loses captaincy access after taking dig at ZeishanPranit More's stand-up comedy act in the latest episode of 'Bigg Boss 19' irked Zeeshan Quadri and Tanya Mittal. Housemates later voted in favour of Zeishan Quadri and eliminated Pranit More from the race for captaincy.

Slow Horses 5 trailer: Gary Oldman returns as head of misfits to probe terror plotThe first trailer for actor Gary Oldman's 'Slow Horses Season 5' has been released. The new season delves into London terror plots as Oldman's Jackson Lamb leads his team of misfits.

Avatar The Way of Water to re-release in India in October ahead of Fire and AshJames Cameron's 'Avatar: The Way of Water' is set to re-release in Indian theatres from October 2, 2025, offering an immersive 3D experience ahead of the next franchise chapter, 'Avatar: Fire & Ash'.

general news.headline: Double dose of support, growth for India: PM praises GST reforms, jabs CongressThe government, after the 56th meeting of the GST Council, approved the rationalisation of GST rates, abolishing the 12 per cent and 28 per cent slabs. The new slab structure will come into effect from September 22, the first day of Navaratri.

Trump hosts tech CEOs for White House dinner, Musk absent from guest listPresident Donald Trump hosted tech leaders, including Gates, Cook, Zuckerberg and Pichai for a White House dinner, with AI policy in focus. Elon Musk, once an ally, was notably absent.

It's gone now: Ex-US NSA John Bolton says Trump-Modi friendship is historyJohn Bolton says Trump's once-strong personal relationship with Modi is "gone now," warning leaders like UK's Keir Starmer that personal ties with Trump offer no real protection from his unpredictable policies.

Row erupts over 'Halal lifestyle township' project near MumbaiA promotional video for a housing project near Mumbai has sparked a row, with political parties alleging it promotes exclusivity on religious lines.

Dawood's archrival Arun Gawli is back in Byculla ahead of BMC pollsDon Arun Gawli's return to Byculla after an 18-year prison stint has stirred political chatter ahead of the BMC election. Gawli, who is still believed to be influential, might impact voting in the Dagdi Chawl area. Gawli, who rose from a mill worker to a gangster and became an MLA, has been let off on bail during the Ganesh Mahotsav.

Semi-finals Live Updates: Sabalenka reaches third US Open finalUS Open 2025, semi-finals Live Updates: Aryna Sabalenka reaches third US Open final. Yuki Bhambri knocked out of the men's doubles semi-final match

GST overhaul a good step but not sufficient to boost economy, says ChidambaramIn an interview with India Today TV, former Union Finance Minister P Chidambaram on Thursday described the recent GST overhaul as a "necessary step, but not a sufficient step" to boost the nation's economy.

How politics meets floods in a region on the edgeThe recent north Indian disaster shows once again what happens when ecological calamity becomes combustible fuel for party politics and other ulterior motives.

Giorgio Armani, Italian fashion mogul, dies at 91 due to age-related illnessKnown as "Re Giorgio" or King Giorgio, Armani, 91, was known for his modern Italian style and elegance. His funeral chamber will be set up on September 6 and 7 in Milan.

India-US ties will weather storms despite blips, says Piyush Goyal amid tariff warThe India-US bilateral relations have been strained after Donald Trump announced 50 per cent tariffs on Indian goods over its Russian oil imports.

Inside story of GST meet: States' resistance, vote call, and then a breakthroughRelief for the middle class and poor was at stake as the GST Council meeting stretched past 7 pm on Wednesday. With opposition-ruled states resisting tax reforms, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman insisted that the people could not be kept waiting another day.

Exclusive: Tariffs on India key to Ukraine peace, Team Trump tells US top courtThe Trump administration took the fight over tariffs to the Supreme Court, asking the justices to rule quickly that the president has the power to impose sweeping import taxes.

In satellite pics: Delhi-NCR floods captured from aboveSatellite images and on-ground visuals capture the scale of Delhi-NCR's flood crisis — from Yamuna spilling over its embankments to flooded Gurugram's roads.

Washington DC sues Trump administration over National Guard deploymentThe litigation could also lead to another judicial rebuke of Trump's attempt to broaden the role of the military on US soil, following a ruling this week that his use of troops to fight crime in California was unlawful.
Afghanistan hit by 6.2 magnitude earthquake, days after deadly tremorsThe quake was at a depth of 10 km (6.21 miles) in southeastern Afghanistan, the German Research Centre for Geosciences said.

Israeli military claims 40% control of Gaza City, vows to expand offensive soonGaza's health authorities said at least 53 Palestinians were killed on Thursday, mostly in Gaza City. Residents reported strikes across Zeitoun, Sabra, Tuffah, and Shejaia districts, with tanks pushing into the Sheikh Radwan area.

PM Modi discusses Ukraine war, free trade pact in joint call with EU leadersPM Modi held a joint call with EU leaders, discussed trade, security, and Ukraine, invited them to India for the next summit, and reaffirmed his commitment to strengthen the India-EU strategic partnership.

GST reforms: Economic prudence or political compulsion? Democratic Newsroom debatesIn this episode of Democratic Newsroom, the focus is on the GST bonanza announced on Wednesday by the GST Council limiting slabs to 5 per cent and 18 per cent.

The Return of Sonu Nigam and the voice Bollywood forgotSonu Nigam makes a powerful return to Bollywood, reviving the magic of melody that the industry has been missing for years. With 'Bijuria' and 'Pardesiya' striking gold, one thing is clear: Nigam is and will always be irreplaceable.

Zuckerberg's hot mic, Gates' praise, Pichai's relief: Inside Trump's tech dinnerPresident Trump hosted top tech leaders at the White House, joking about health rumours, discussing Ukraine, jobs, and NYC politics, while Zuckerberg's hot mic, Gates' vaccine praise, and Google's relief grabbed attention.

Sugar is sin: Why India's new GST reform hits your cola harder than cigarettesFor the first time, sugary drinks like colas, iced teas, and energy drinks face a steep 40% GST, alongside tobacco and alcohol. Here's why sugar is India's newest "sin" and what it means for your health.

Watch: Lionel Messi in tears, then on target in last match for Argentina at homeLionel Messi was in tears before finding the back of the net to give Argentina a 1-0 lead against Venezuela in Buenos Aires on Thursday, September 4, in what could be his final World Cup qualifier on home soil.

Cut out the middle man: Zohran Mamdani dares Trump to a televised debateThe challenge came shortly after Cuomo publicly called on Mamdani to participate in five debates. Cuomo, aiming to boost his own visibility, said that the debates would be held across each borough in New York City during a press conference on Thursday.

Biden undergoes surgery to remove new skin cancer lesions, spokesperson confirmsJoe Biden recently underwent surgery to remove skin cancer lesions, his spokesperson confirmed. The former president, already battling prostate cancer, has a long history of personal and family cancer struggles.

sports.headline: Asia Cup 2025: How India can reach the final in Rajgir? Scenarios explainedThe Super 4s stage is wide open, but India holds the advantage over the rest following their 4-1 win against Malaysia on Thursday, September 4. Here's what all four teams need to make it to the final of the Asia Cup on Sunday.

Watch: Lionel Messi in tears, then on target in last match for Argentina at homeLionel Messi was in tears before finding the back of the net to give Argentina a 1-0 lead against Venezuela in Buenos Aires on Thursday, September 4, in what could be his final World Cup qualifier on home soil.

US Open: Yuki Bhambri's dream run ends with semifinal loss in men's doublesUS Open 2025: India's Yuki Bhambri and his KIwi partner Michael Venus were knocked out in the men's doubles semi-final after a three-set battle against higher-ranked Joe Salisbury and Neil Skupski.

Semi-finals Live Updates: Sabalenka reaches third US Open finalUS Open 2025, semi-finals Live Updates: Aryna Sabalenka reaches third US Open final. Yuki Bhambri knocked out of the men's doubles semi-final match

Pakistan recover from Afghanistan shocker to qualify for tri-series finalPakistan bounced back from an earlier loss to reach the tri-series final by defeating UAE by 31 runs in Sharjah. The victory sets up a high-stakes final against Afghanistan, highlighting strong performances from Fakhar Zaman and Abrar Ahmed.

Punjab Kings donate ₹33.8 lakh to support flood relief in PunjabIndian Premier League (IPL) franchise Punjab Kings (PBKS) has come out in support of the flood victims in Punjab by donating Rs 33.8 lakh in relief funds.

Aryna Sabalenka vs Jessica Pegula semi-final: When and where to watch?Aryna Sabalenka and Jessica Pegula will clash in the US Open 2025 semifinal in a highly anticipated rematch. Pegula aims to avenge last year's final loss on home soil, adding extra drama to the contest.

Shreya Ghoshal to perform at ICC Women's Cricket World Cup 2025 opening ceremonyShreya Ghoshal will perform at the ICC Women's Cricket World Cup 2025 opening ceremony in Guwahati. The event promises affordable tickets and a vibrant celebration of women's cricket, boosting fan engagement across India.

Asia Cup 2025: India thrash Malaysia with comeback win as final race heats upIndia secured a sensational comeback win against Malaysia as the race to the final in the Asia Cup 2025 heats up in Rajgir. China's win over Korea has left the Super 4s wide open, with all four teams still having the chance to make it to the final.

Women's World Cup: ICC announces cheapest-ever tickets, prices as low as Rs 100The International Cricket Council (ICC) announced ticket sales for the Women's World Cup 2025 at a record low price for any global ICC event.

Salah bids farewell to Harvey Elliot after Liverpool exit: You leave as championMohammed Salah has penned a heartfelt post on social media to honour the contributions of Harvey Elliott who now leaves the club to join Aston Villa

Aryna Sabalenka vs Jessica Pegula semi-final: When and where to watch?Aryna Sabalenka and Jessica Pegula will clash in the US Open 2025 semifinal in a highly anticipated rematch. Pegula aims to avenge last year's final loss on home soil, adding extra drama to the contest.

The event promises affordable tickets and a vibrant celebration of women's cricket, boosting fan engagement across India.

China's win over Korea has left the Super 4s wide open, with all four teams still having the chance to make it to the final.

Women's World Cup: ICC announces cheapest-ever tickets, prices as low as Rs 100The International Cricket Council (ICC) announced ticket sales for the Women's World Cup 2025 at a record low price for any global ICC event.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
